attributes.action: Cut carbon emissions by 80% this year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Global temperatures have risen 1.8C since 1850 and are rising 0.3C per decade. We reach 2C in 6 years unless carbon emissions are cut directly. The carbon sinks are failing. We must provide renewable energy and close down the coal and oil fired power stations.
